Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is grey-black in section, interior spotted with dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior covered with red-brown slip and the smudged remains of four lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393273) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393273)
